item.title: PolandRebuilding (for PM 2.76 and 1.56) v2.6.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 29, 2025

PolandRebuilding (for PM 2.76 and 1.56) v2.6.1 ETS2

The current map update, designated 2.6.x for 1.55 and PM 2.75, is a somewhat unexpected surprise on our part. Main features included in this update (aside from numerous fixes) are: Wadowice, moved from PM, a refreshed Bielsko-Biała, a refreshed section of the A4, and a rebuilt DK7/S7 from the border with Slovakia.

Due to the numerous reuploads of mod to other hostings, starting with version 2.6.1, to limit this activity, you will be required to generate DEF package directly on our website (1th DL link, “Generate” button next to DEF package). We hope this will reduce the number of reuploads. This change will also result in another important change. To play in Convoy mode with PR map, the host will must allow the use of optional MODs.

Changelog for 2.6.1:
Adapted map for ETS2 1.56 patch and ProMods 2.76

Credits: PR Team

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: VOLVO FH 2018 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 29, 2025

VOLVO FH 2018 1.56 ETS2

Cabs and Chassis: Various options, including long and possibly lowered chassis, and varying cab heights.
Engines and Transmissions: Various power options and Volvo gearboxes.

Lighting and Signaling:
LED headlights and daytime running lights.
LED bars and auxiliary lights on the roof and grille.
Custom position lights and taillights.

Exterior Details:
PX antennas.
Additional air horns.
Custom bumpers and spoilers.
Air deflectors and side skirts.
Unique wheels and hubcaps.

Interior:
Dashboard and steering wheel customization.
Decorative accessories (curtains, GPS, trim).

Credits: alm

item.title: Niccoló New Isidro 3 Multichassis V3.2 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 29, 2025

Niccoló New Isidro 3 Multichassis V3.2 1.56 ETS2

The Niccoló New Isidro 3 is an Argentine industry coach bus, manufactured by Niccoló.
It is the first mod we released with ARBus Mods. It was made from scratch, and its development was made possible thanks to the funding from the community, to whom we are immensely grateful for their support.
This mod is free under license CC BY-NC-ND 4.0, and its sale or monetized reupload is prohibited.

This is the official release, uploaded by the creators of the mod to ets2.lt. You can confirm its authenticity through the creator verification on the download link. Please note that any monetized reupload using a different link violates our license and will be reported — including deindexing from search engines and DMCA notices to the hosting provider.

Features:
– Mercedes Benz O500RSD with optional third directional axis.
– Scania K440 & K450 (new)
– Variables with/without sensor.
– 63 Argentine skins in 8K contributed by the community.
– Animated doors and luggage compartment.
– Multiple customization options.
– Own sound.
– Realistic interior.
– Realistic engine and gearbox specifications.
– Compatibility and optimization for multiplayer.
– Over 30 destination signs (we recommend using the Argentine map “Mapa Ceibo”).
– Nighttime interior shadows.

Changelog V3.1->V3.2
– Fixed collision issues.
– Corrected rear Mercedes-Benz logo.
– Added K450 engine, associated with new steering wheel.
– General sound adjustments.
– Repositioned “camera 5”.
– Added missing icons in customization.

Credits: -ARBus Mods 3D Modeling: Tamaki Texturing and conversion: Anti -Contributors Sounds: Bimo Skins: dany20rp, Mauro Navarrete, Sebastián Quinteros, bussimulacionarg, Mariano Saucedo, bascraft, Fer Illanes, Lautaro Correa, mode05 3D Assistant: Adrian Sign material: ModShop

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Real companies, gas stations & billboards Extended v1.03.01 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 29, 2025

Real companies, gas stations & billboards Extended v1.03.01 ATS

Real Companies, Gas Stations & Billboards Extended takes your ATS experience to the next level, merging the familiar with the extraordinary.
Dive into a world where every delivery feels like a real-world operation and every mile driven is a step further into authentic American trucking.

Added Las Vegas Sphere as deliverable company
Added Daikin Park Houston as deliverable company
Relocated Ikea Houston for future mod-compatibilty
Reworked Ikea Las Vegas
Changed SoFi Stadium from constructionsite to stadium
Changed WC2025 to WC2026 signage
Bugfixes

Credits: MLH82

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Toyota Camry XV70 XSE 2018 V2.1 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 29, 2025

Toyota Camry XV70 XSE 2018 V2.1 1.56 ETS2

CHANGELOG:
– Updated to game version 1.56

Specifications:
– Openable Front Windows
– Wipers work accurately
– Realistic engine & transmission configuration
– Very high-quality exterior & interior
– 7 types of rims

*To achieve the top speed, slot the car into the 6th gear*

FAQ:
Q: Where to purchase it?:
A: Truck Dealers > Access Mod Dealer > Toyota

Credits: Nimit, İsmail Kaan, Mert İrşi
